content.prompt: Women played a crucial role in the domestication of plants because they

choices.label: were interested in varying the diets of their families
were agile climbers on the hillsides of the Fertile Crescent
knew how to achieve control over their environment
traveled long distances from their home base

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
